title: Bridgerton: behind the scenes of season 2
itunes:title: Bridgerton: behind the scenes of season 2
itunes:subtitle: Historical consultant Hannah Greig takes us behind the scenes of Bridgerton and explores the real history surrounding the period drama
description:
Hannah Greig, a historical consultant to the hit series Bridgerton, takes us behind the scenes of season two. She speaks to Elinor Evans about the real history on screen, from Regency etiquette to the gentlemen’s clubs that gained popularity in the era.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
